column1: Service Domain specification for Financial Market Analysis

column2: Analyze available sources of internal and external financial market information and research to develop insights and opinions on any aspect of financial market activity and pricing
Example of use:. A competitor financial pricing analysis is requested for a company issuing corporate paper
Provide different types of financial market analysis using available financial market information and research

Identify sources of financial market research. Select appropriate analytical algorithms/hypotheses to apply. Consolidate information and apply/refine algorithms. Interpret and present analytical insights
